name: Tamashi The Brave Ninja
description:
Story :

tamashi was a young and arrogant ninja from a really well-known ninja family. he always wanted to prove himself to his father whose expectations were always high due to his family history. tamashi was always jealous of his brother Manji who was more powerful than him. manji on the other hand didn't have any hatred toward his brother and wanted to help tamashi to gain some social credit. manji suggested his brother go and fight the rouge ninja camps in the forest and cave near their village. join tamashi to help him beat these rouge ninjas.

Use case :

Try windows build too, It has improved optimization and vfx. :)
